}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The FCC documents would indicate that this was meant to be used as an internal wireless module for some Xbox One S models.
"WN3502R" is silkscreened on the board (OEM: [[Lite-On]]) {{See also|Lite-On WN3502R|Lite-On WCBN3507R|Lite-On WCBN3510A}}
